action

类 BaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • action.BaseAction
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
    直接已知子类:
    ChangeActivityAction, ChangeInfoAction, EmployeeLoginAction, LoginAction, MakeActivityAction, RegisterAction, ScheduleActivityAction, SeeActivityAction, SeeOKActivityAction, SeePaymentAction, ShowActivitiesAction, ShowActivityChartsAction, ShowCardsAction, ShowUserChartsAction, UnScheduleActivityAction

    public class BaseAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware
    基础的Action类，实现了Action需要的公用属性和公用方法
    从以下版本开始:
    1.7
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    王选易
    另请参阅:
